original_title: Dink Flamingo's Active Duty Live Christmas
overview: You never know what's gonna happen when you throw Santa together with 12 of his hottest men. An Active Duty Christmas is a two-disc set and is nearly three hours long. The wonderful men featured here are Dean, Tony, Tarzan, Cole, the Twins, Donnie, Chaz, Colin, Ty, Hoss and Luke. It was a simple idea, really ... but the results were more than fantastic. I hope as you enjoy this two-disc set that you'll be in the spirit of giving this year as we share some very special Christmas memories of our own with you.
title: Dink Flamingo's Active Duty Live Christmas
